title: AYZY Gaming searching for Mid/Jung Gold+
body:
Hi Guys,

as you can already see in the title, our Team AYZY Gaming is searching for a Midlaner and Jungler.
We are a Group of six Members, but due some time limitations and the lost interest towards League, only 3-4 Players are still active.
We do tryhard in Team Rankeds for sure, but don't take it as serious as others probably. The fun factor overweighs.
Although our core of 3-4 Players is still active, we don't really play regularly. So when some of us are up to play some Team Ranked, we do it spontaneously. But when we do, it's about to get freaking hot in EUW. ;)
AYZY Gaming is more than a Team. It's a Lifestyle.

So what do we require from YOU in order to join us?

ELO: Gold+
Language: German/English
Age: 18+
Programs: Team Speak, WhatsApp

... and of course AYZY mentality.

So if you think you fullfill these requirements, don't hesitate to contact me.

Kühni

PS: Yes we got placed in Bronze 3. It was not our fault cough. So yea.. It can only get better :D
